directions: Cook and stir squash and green beans in a nonstick skillet over medium heat until slightly softened, 2 to 3 minutes. Stir tomatoes, lemon juice, parsley, coriander, salt, and black pepper into squash mixture; cook and stir until tomatoes have softened, 5 to 10 minutes.
ingredients: 1/8 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste
title: Squash and Green Bean Saute Side Dish
